0.name: Nina N.
0.text: The Akashic Records open a gateway for me: to deep spiritual wisdom and experiences of past lives. Mysterious yet tangible – a mirror of my soul. For me, the perfect balance between depth and clarity.

1.name: Nicolas M.
1.text: The heart healing was gentle and incredibly powerful. After just one session, I felt a deep shift - as if something had opened inside me. I sensed clarity and connection like I hadn't in a long time. The space Coco creates is full of warmth and intuition. It gave me the courage to go deeper and meet my true self.

2.name: Michelle H.
2.text: You bridge the worldly and the spiritual in a wonderful way - clear, grounded and full of light. In your mindful, loving presence, a space emerges where genuine healing can happen. Your work has truly moved me forward. Professionally and personally, you are a real gift.

3.name: Simone P.
3.text: During the heart healing I felt a warmth like a hand on my heart - tears, calm, a deep arriving. After the session came strong, clear feelings and insights - real transformation. It’s the most intense and effective form of healing I have ever experienced. With Coco I feel seen, safely accompanied and met without judgment.

meta.title: Akashic Reading, Heart Healing & Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli

twitter.title: Akashic Reading, Heart Healing & Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli

s1.title: Back to you.
s1.kicker: For more clarity, inner strength and a life aligned with your essence
s1.p1:
Sometimes you feel that something inside you is calling for change
Not loudly
But steadily
s1.p2:
Maybe it’s the feeling of being stuck.
Or the desire to see more clearly again, to feel calmer inside and to make decisions from within yourself instead of from adaptation, pressure or fear
s1.p3:
Together we look at what is holding you back internally. We release outdated patterns
and create space for new clarity, inner stability and sustainable change.
s1.p4:
This is not about self-optimization
Not about higher, faster, more
But about reconnection, awareness and honest inner work
s1.p5:
I support you in letting go of inner weight, rebuilding trust in yourself and
following your own inner compass again.
You are allowed to remember who you are.
s1.p6: If you feel this path calling you, I invite you to take the next step

meta.title: About me
meta.description: My path, my values, my work: social worker & coach - why I accompany people on their way to clarity, healing and self-empowerment.

og.title: About me | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: Background & stance: heart healing, coaching and Akashic Records - human, clear, authentic.

twitter.title: About me | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: Who I am and how I work - with depth and connection.

intro.title: About me
intro.p1:
From early on, I’ve been interested in what moves people on the inside and how real change actually happens. Questions of justice, inner freedom and self-determination have shaped my path from the very beginning. Driven by this, I studied Social Work with the goal of accompanying people through challenging life phases in a professional, respectful and equal way.

In my work, I’ve had the privilege of getting to know many different life realities. I supported unaccompanied minor refugees, worked with adults in the asylum sector, assisted people affected by substance dependence - in therapy, harm reduction and prevention - and accompanied women, children and adolescents through sensitive transitions and crisis periods. Every encounter has taught me how much strength, vulnerability and wisdom lives within each person.
intro.p2:
My own path has also been shaped by highs and lows: personal crises, new beginnings, inner transformation processes. Especially formative were my almost eight years in Latin America. That time changed me deeply - as a human being and as a professional. There I learned to relate to life with more trust, depth and connection.

Over the years, it became clear to me: true change does not begin on the outside. It begins where we meet ourselves honestly. This path isn’t always comfortable - but it is healing. During this phase, coaching and energy work entered my life. They helped me recognize old patterns, release inner blocks and come closer to my own truth.
intro.p3: Today, all of these experiences flow into my work. I combine professional competence with presence, life experience and a refined sense for what truly matters. In my coaching and energy work, I create a safe space where you can feel seen, heard and taken seriously - and where personal growth and inner stability become possible. I am convinced: Every person already carries the power for change within. Sometimes all it takes is the right space - and mindful support - for that power to unfold.

right: Training: Heart healing, Akashic Records reading, Spiritual Alignment, Chakra Clearing

left: Escuela de Formación de Líderes, Buenos Aires, Argentina
University of Applied Sciences Social Work

meta.title: Ontological Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
meta.description: Clarity, focus and real implementation: coaching at eye level for professional & personal topics - in Zurich & online.

og.title: Ontological Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: From insight to action: broaden perspectives, make decisions, move into action.

twitter.title: Ontological Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: Create clarity, set priorities, move into action.

alt1.title: Ontological Coaching – Change begins in being
alt1.body:
Ontological coaching accompanies you on a deeper level. Not only in what you do, but in who you are at your core.

The focus is not on quick problem-solving, but on an honest, clarifying question: Who am I, and how do I shape my life from this inner truth?

Instead of working on the surface, we turn our attention to your being. To how you think, speak and feel, and how you perceive the world. Because this is exactly where the key to real, sustainable change lies.

Ontological coaching is not a quick fix. It is a conscious journey back to yourself – in your tempo, your depth, your own rhythm.

It brings clarity, broadens your perspective and activates the potential that already exists within you.

For conscious decisions For inner connection For a life lived from your center

alt2.title: Coaching as guidance on your path back to yourself:
alt2.bodyIntro: Coaching is a space where you meet yourself. It helps you to:
items: find orientation and clarity for your own path
live your strengths and values more consciously again
release inner blockages and develop new perspectives
anchor change sustainably
clarify conflicts on both inner and outer levels
strengthen trust in your own resources
unfold your potential at your own pace

centered.title: Ontological coaching – clarity in being as the foundation for change
centered.body:
My coaching is based on the ontological coaching approach. The focus is not primarily on behavior or short-term problem-solving, but on the being of the person – the way you perceive, interpret and act in the world.

Ontological coaching assumes that sustainable change emerges where ways of thinking, emotional patterns and linguistic habits become conscious. Together, we reflect on how these levels shape your actions, decisions and relationships.

The coaching process is individual, structured and solution-oriented. It creates a professional space for reflection in which inner blockages become visible, new perspectives arise and room for action expands. The goal is to gain clarity, strengthen self-responsibility and make decisions from a conscious inner stance.

Through targeted questions and mindful guidance, I support you in recognizing your own patterns, reordering connections and anchoring sustainable change in thinking, feeling and acting.

The prerequisite for coaching is openness: the willingness to question existing patterns and allow new perspectives.

steps.title: The coaching process – what to expect
steps.subtitle: Change begins with a first step. Here you can see how the coaching process with me unfolds:

items.title: Free initial consultation
items.body: In our first conversation, we get to know each other (approx. 20 minutes). You share what is currently moving you, and together we clarify how I can best support you. This initial meeting is non-binding and free of charge.

items.title: Individual coaching sessions
items.body: In the coaching sessions, we work specifically on your current concerns. Based on the ontological coaching approach, we look not only at possible solutions, but above all at the underlying patterns of thinking, language and emotion that shape your actions.

items.title: Reflection & further development
items.body: At the end of the process, we look back together: What has changed? What continues to support you? And how can you stay connected with yourself on your path forward?

steps.footer:
This path can be emotionally moving - and that is exactly where its power lies:

In the end, a deep feeling of clarity, lightness and new energy often emerges.

meta.title: Akashic Records Reading
meta.description: Clarity on blocks, patterns and next steps: compassionate Akashic Records readings in Zurich & online.

og.title: Akashic Records Reading | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: Answers with depth: Akashic Records reading for orientation, healing and inner alignment.

twitter.title: Akashic Records Reading | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: See the connections, dissolve blocks, find your path.

alt1.title: Akasha Records – Clarity about your path and your blocks
alt1.body:
The Akasha Records are often described as the subtle field of consciousness – a space in which experiences, insights and learning processes on a soul level are stored. Many spiritual traditions understand them as a source of wisdom, orientation and inner healing.

In an Akasha reading, access opens to information that goes beyond the rational mind. The messages from the Akasha are clear, loving and precise. They make soul-level connections visible, help to understand recurring patterns and consciously release inner blocks.

This creates a deeper understanding of your life path – of what has shaped you, and of what can support you now. The Akasha Records invite you to reconnect with your inner truth and to make decisions from a deeper sense of clarity.

They remind you of who you are beyond roles, expectations and old stories On a soul level

alt2.title: Insights that remind you – and guide you forward
alt2.bodyIntro:
An Akasha reading can offer you deep insights and new perspectives exactly where you are in your life right now. It opens a space in which you are invited to recognize and understand yourself on a soul level.

Through this, you may:
items: gain a deeper understanding of your current emotional state
recognize your soul path and life purpose more clearly
become aware of and release recurring patterns
gently transform inner entanglements, blocks or fears
develop new perspectives on inner and outer challenges
find greater inner clarity and energetic alignment
strengthen the connection to your soul and learn to trust it again
alt2.bodyOutro: This work is for people who feel: There is more – and I am ready to recognize it.

topics.title: Possible topics in an Akashic reading
topics.subtitle: Here are some topics that can be addressed in a reading:

columns.title: Love & partnership
items: Recognize and dissolve karmic entanglements
Understand causes and patterns in relationship conflicts
Clarify foreign influences
Recognize shared soul goals
Strengthen trust and respect in partnership
Recognize soulmates

columns.title: Career & vocation
items: Find your vocation
See and reach goals more clearly
Recognize karmic patterns in the work environment
Uncover blocking influences from the environment
Make decisions with inner clarity

columns.title: Family & ancestors
items: Recognize ancestral themes and intergenerational patterns
Dissolve entanglements with parents or children
Understand learning tasks within the family
Recognize and set boundaries against foreign influences

columns.title: Health & body awareness
items: Attune to the body's messages
Emotional and energetic causes
Recognize physical complaints
Dissolve foreign influences energetically

columns.title: Finances & abundance
items: Understand karmic themes related to money and success
Recognize causes of financial blocks
Consciously activate energetic abundance

columns.title: Spirituality & soul connection
items: Recognize spiritual abilities and potentials
Deepen connection to spiritual guides
Strengthen intuitive perception

steps.title: How an Akashic reading works
steps.subtitle: Each reading is unique - just like you. Here's how I work and what to expect:

items.title: Preparation for the reading
items.body: Before each reading, I prepare myself with care and attune in a meditative connection to your soul and your energetic level. In doing so, I open a protected space to receive the information that is essential for you in this moment. I connect with your soul energy as well as with your spiritual guides, always in respect of your free will and in alignment with your highest good. This creates a clear and safe foundation for a reading that is supportive, respectful and attuned to you.

items.title: Receiving the messages
items.body: During the reading, I receive intuitive, spiritual messages from your Akashic Records. These reveal deeper connections in your life path and provide answers that help you see more clearly and follow your way with more trust.

steps.footer: Your soul brings exactly the topics to light that matter now. I act as the messenger - clear, mindful and attentive. This creates a space for insight, healing and deep connection with yourself.

meta.title: Hopi Heart Healing
meta.description: Gentle heart healing for inner calm, connection and emotional clarity - in Zurich & online.

og.title: Hopi Heart Healing | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: Open the heart, calm the nervous system, come back to yourself.

twitter.title: Hopi Heart Healing | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: More calm, love and clarity - from the heart.

alt1.title: Hopi Heart Healing – your heart knows the way
alt1.body:
Hopi Heart Healing is a gentle yet deeply effective form of energy work rooted in the ancient wisdom of the Hopi tradition. It works on the level of the heart – where soul experiences, emotional imprints and your greatest inner strength reside.

Through this heart-centered work, what has long been protected or closed off can gently begin to open, step by step. Old wounds, fears and inner blocks may dissolve, as well as patterns that often unconsciously prevent you from allowing love, abundance and true connection into your life.

Hopi Heart Healing supports you in gently transforming emotional burdens. In this process, not only personal themes may arise, but also inherited imprints from the ancestral line that were passed on without being consciously chosen.

This creates space for inner clarity, lightness and a deep heart connection with yourself and with others.

alt2.title: When your heart calls for healing
alt2.bodyIntro:
This heart work is for people who wish to be touched and supported on a heart level – especially during times of change, inner restlessness or emotional strain. It creates a protected space in which healing, relief and new connection can unfold.

It is especially suitable for people who:
items: feel internally blocked, overwhelmed or emotionally exhausted
wish to mindfully release old wounds, grief or fears
want to reconnect with their heart energy and inner center
seek to find peace with themselves and their past
long for emotional healing, inner calm and stability
wish to clarify attachment themes, relationship pain or old heart wounds
desire a deeper connection with themselves and with others
experience exhaustion, depressive phases, grief or difficult-to-define complaints
are in a phase of change, crisis or reorientation
wish to strengthen emotional security as a child or for their child, for example after parental separation
alt2.bodyOutro:
This work does not replace medical or therapeutic treatment, but it can be a valuable and supportive accompaniment on an emotional and energetic level.

A space for your heart For relief For new connection and inner calm

steps.title: Process of a Hopi Heart Healing

items.title: Arriving & attuning
items.body: At the beginning, you take time to arrive and settle in at your own pace. In a short introductory conversation, we gently look at what is currently moving you – emotionally, mentally or physically. This creates a mindful space in which everything is welcome.

items.title: Heart work & energetic guidance
items.body: You are invited to lie down or sit comfortably – and simply receive. I connect with the source of Hopi energy and work intuitively through your heart center. The energy flows exactly where it is needed – lovingly, clearly and often deeply touching. Old wounds, blocks or inherited patterns may gently release.

items.title: After the session
items.body: After the session, you have space to gently feel into the experience – fully with yourself, without haste. In a mindful exchange, we reflect together on what has shown itself and how you can integrate the experience for yourself. The energetic effect often continues to unfold over several days – quietly, subtly and yet deeply. Many people report a greater sense of inner peace, a feeling of openness and spaciousness in the heart, and a more compassionate attitude toward themselves.

steps.footer:
Give yourself time. Drink plenty of water, allow yourself rest and listen to your body.

Healing does not happen under pressure – it unfolds when you give it space.

meta.title: Chakra Clearing
meta.description: Cleanse and harmonize energy centers: more clarity, balance and vitality - as a session in Zurich or online.

og.title: Chakra Clearing
og.description: Dissolve blocks, get energy flowing, find your center.

twitter.title: Chakra Clearing
twitter.description: More clarity, balance and vitality - chakra by chakra.

alt1.title: Chakra Clearing – clarity, balance & renewed vitality
alt1.body:
The seven main chakras are subtle energy centers along the spine. They influence how we feel physically, how we respond emotionally, and how we are mentally aligned.

When these centers fall out of balance – for example due to stress, emotional strain or external influences – this can manifest as inner restlessness, exhaustion or a feeling of being disconnected from yourself.

A chakra clearing gently supports you in harmonizing your energy and bringing it back into balance. On an energetic, emotional and soulful level, space is created for clarity, stability and renewed life force. Many people experience a stronger sense of centering and inner presence afterward.

Your energy is the key. Chakra clearing helps it flow freely again.

alt2.title: Chakra clearing gently brings your energy back into flow
items: finding more inner calm and balance
experiencing a clear, powerful sense of energy
strengthening your intuition and self-awareness
mindfully releasing emotional burdens
bringing more lightness into your everyday life
deepening body and soul awareness

steps.title: Chakra clearing process

items.title: Preparation
items.body: Before we begin, you take time to arrive within yourself. In a short, mindful conversation, we look together at what is currently moving you and which topic would like to be given space. You are invited to gently open to what wants to be seen, felt and released – at your own pace and in your own way. Everything is welcome. Nothing is required.

items.title: During the session
items.intro: In a calm, protected space, you are invited to relax – sitting or lying down, just as feels right for you. The session unfolds mindfully, at your pace and without pressure. I work along your seven main chakras and support the natural flow of energy through intuitive perception and gentle energetic impulses.

items.title: After the session
items.body: Many people report feeling more lightness, inner clarity and a deeper sense of connection with themselves afterward. After a chakra clearing, the energetic effect may continue to resonate – gently and in your own time. Energy work often initiates deeper processes that can unfold in different ways in the days following the session.

steps.footer:
Give yourself time. Drink enough water, allow rest and listen to your body.

Healing does not happen under pressure - it unfolds when you give it space.

meta.title: Energetic Alignment
meta.description: Energetic alignment: dissolve blocks, find orientation and experience more lightness & energy in everyday life.

og.title: Energetic Alignment
og.description: Bring body, mind and soul into balance - gently and holistically.

twitter.title: Energetic Alignment
twitter.description: Alignment & balance - for more freedom in body and life.

alt1.title: Energetic Alignment – change begins in being
alt1.body:
Energetic Alignment is a gentle yet deeply effective method that brings body, mind and soul back into harmony. It is based on the understanding that the physical body and the energetic system are inseparably connected.

The spine is far more than just the physical center of our upright posture. It functions as a central energy channel, an inner tree of life through which stability, alignment and vital energy flow.

During the alignment, your energetic system is gently realigned. Energetic blockages may dissolve, tensions can regulate, and the spine finds its way back into its natural order. With it, your entire system returns to balance.

This work does not function through effort or correction, but through awareness and inner alignment. Change occurs where your being becomes clear, stable and connected again.

alt2.title: Your spine as the key to inner alignment
alt2.bodyIntro: This work may support you if you:
items: experience physical discomfort or chronic tension
wish to release emotional blockages or deeply rooted patterns
long for greater inner balance, stability and lightness
want to consciously reconnect with your energy, vitality and joy for life
are seeking a holistic method that addresses body, mind and soul equally
alt2.outro:
Through inner alignment, new life energy can be released.
It affects not only your spine, but your entire system down to every single cell. This creates space for stability, clarity and a deeper connection to yourself.

steps.title: Session process - energetic alignment
steps.subtitle: Each session takes place in a protected, mindful space - focused on your physical, emotional and energetic balance.

items.title: Arriving & pre-talk
items.body: At the beginning you take time to arrive within yourself. In a short conversation we clarify what is currently moving you and whether there are specific topics or complaints to include in the session.

items.title: Attunement & energetic alignment
items.body: You lie down or sit comfortably while I connect with your energy system. Intuitively and without touch, I work along your spine and guide energy where blocks are felt. Your system responds gently - alignment happens through consciousness, not physical manipulation.

items.title: After the session
items.body: We take time for a conscious close. You can feel what has moved - and we discuss how to gently integrate the experience into everyday life. The energy often accompanies you for a while - gently yet sustainably.

steps.footer:
Give yourself time. Drink enough water, gift yourself rest and listen to your body.

Healing does not happen under pressure - it unfolds when you give it space.

meta.title: doTERRA AromaTouch
meta.description: AromaTouch technique: mindful application with essential oils for relaxation, regeneration and nervous system balance.

og.title: doTERRA AromaTouch
og.description: A soothing time-out for body, mind and senses - gentle, deep, balancing.

alt1.title: AromaTouch Technique – a mindful application for body and senses
alt1.body:
The AromaTouch Technique is a holistic application that works on a physical, emotional, and energetic level. Through the combination of high-quality doTERRA essential oils and mindful touch, your entire system is invited into a state of deep relaxation and regeneration.

This method was developed to reduce stress, calm the nervous system, and naturally bring body, mind, and soul back into balance.

During the application, eight carefully selected essential oils are gently applied along the spine and on the reflex zones of the feet. With calm, intentional touch, the oils are worked in mindfully to promote relaxation, support the immune system, and strengthen emotional balance.

The AromaTouch Technique offers you a conscious pause from everyday life deeply relaxing, strengthening, and harmonizing.

alt2.title: Back into balance with the power of essential oils
alt2.bodyIntro: The AromaTouch application supports your entire system in returning to a natural state of balance. It may help to:
items: regulate the autonomic nervous system
strengthen the immune system
prevent or reduce inflammatory reactions in the body
promote deep mental and physical relaxation
bring body, mind, and soul back into balance
alt2.bodyOutro: Many people experience the treatment as deeply relaxing and clarifying – while also gently invigorating and energizing.

centered.title: AromaTouch Technique – Process
centered.bodyIntro:
The application takes place in a calm, protected atmosphere. You remain fully clothed throughout the session; only the back and feet are gently uncovered. This allows you to relax and arrive fully with yourself.

In a fixed, proven sequence, eight selected doTERRA essential oils are gently applied along the spine and on the reflex zones of the feet. The oils are worked in with calm, intentional touch to unfold their effects optimally.

Among others, the following oils are used:
oils: Balance – supports grounding and inner stability
On Guard – supportive for the immune system
AromaTouch™ – relaxing for muscles and nervous system
centered.bodyOutro: The application follows a clear structure while creating space for deep relaxation, regeneration, and energetic balance.

twitter.title: Seminars

intro.title: Seminars
intro.body:
Seminars are guided spaces of experience.
They invite you to pause, question familiar patterns of thinking and acting, and develop new inner perspectives.

Not as a course with solutions – but as a shared process.

seminars.title: Current seminars
seminars.subtitle: Multi-part formats – online or live – with space for exchange, reflection, and integration.

items.title: To be aware. To become aware. To live consciously.
items.body:
An inner journey in three encounters.
For people who want to engage more consciously with change, inner clarity, and self-connection.

meta.title: To be aware. To become aware. To live consciously. – Online Seminar Spring 2026
meta.description: A three-part online seminar for inner clarity, presence, and conscious change. April–May 2026 · live · online.

og.title: Online Seminar Spring 2026
og.description: To be aware. To become aware. To live consciously. A guided space of experience for inner clarity and presence.

twitter.title: Online Seminar Spring 2026
twitter.description: A three-part online seminar for conscious change.

intro.title:
To be aware
To become aware
To live consciously
intro.subtitle: A three-part online seminar for inner clarity and conscious change.

s1.title: **The turning point begins quietly**
s1.body:
Many people wait for a turning point
that feels unmistakable.

A clear decision.
A new plan.
A moment that changes everything.

But real change often begins differently:
quietly,
unremarkably,
sometimes even unsettling.

This online seminar invites you to look right there.
Not to fix something,
but to experience yourself more consciously.

s2.title: What this online seminar is really about
s2.body:
This online seminar does not follow the logic of self-optimization.
It invites conscious pausing and honest self-perception.

It is a guided space of experience in which you connect with your inner experience:
points: with your patterns of thinking and judging
with what you feel and may have ignored for a long time
with the question of how you want to shape your life more consciously
s2.outro:
Not through performance
Not through concepts
But through perception, presence, and experience

for.title: Who this seminar is for
items: those who have been functioning for a long time
those who have been strong, held it together, pushed through
those who feel that old patterns no longer carry them
those who want to meet themselves more honestly
for.note:
Not to become faster.
But to become more true.

s4.title: The journey through the online seminar

parts.title: To be aware
parts.body:
Becoming present with what is.

Which roles am I living?
Which ideas of right and wrong shape me?
Which patterns have I adopted without questioning them?

parts.title: To become aware
parts.body:
Listening inward and feeling.

What do I really feel?
Where have I moved away from myself?
parts.note: Simple exercises support you in reconnecting with your inner experience.

parts.title: To live consciously
parts.body:
Embodying the new awareness and integrating it into everyday life.

Not as a new concept, but as a lived attitude.

s5.title: What to expect in this online seminar
items: three live online seminars (3 hours each)
access to Zoom recordings if you can’t attend
a clear, safely held space
space for perception, reflection, and exchange
time between sessions for integration

s6.title: Practical information
s6.inviteBody:
You don’t have to perform here.
You don’t have to achieve anything.
You are allowed to simply be.

If you feel
that it’s time to meet yourself more honestly,
then you are welcome.
